definition: surname Yi/name of legendary archer/also written 后羿[Hou4 Yi4]
Houyi, mythological Chinese archer whose wife was Chang'e

sentences.chinese: 烝羿相信上帝是公平的。

definition: Helan county in Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Yin2 chuan1], Ningxia
surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓跋

wife or senior concubine of husbands older brother (old)/elder sister (old)
